verses.roman:
mālīra icchāya śākhā bahuta bāḍila
bāḍiyā paścima deśa saba ācchādila

synonyms: mālīra icchāya—on the desire of the gardener; śākhā—branches; bahuta—many; bāḍila—expanded; bāḍiyā—so expanding; paścima—western; deśa—countries; saba—all; ācchādila—covered.
translation: By the will of the supreme gardener, the branches of Śrīla Rūpa Gosvāmī and Sanātana Gosvāmī grew many times over, expanding throughout the western countries and covering the entire region.
